Quantity of projectiles to use for each shot (default value is 100).
Height to reach while flying along the route (in meters, default value is 2000 meters).
The agent takes off at the specified height and moves toward each waypoint defining the route.
Upon moving nearby the area, the agent tries to launch the specified quantity of projectiles on each encountered enemy found within it.
Upon executing an indirect fire on a target, the report "Indirect fire completed on target [target name]" is displayed.
A target won't be shot if:
it is not at a good firing distance regarding the selected ammunition: the message "target out of range" is displayed.
it is not within the specified area,
the agent doesn't have the physical capability (no suitable launcher for the dotation type): the message "no Launcher" is displayed.
the agent does not have enough dotation: the message "no ammo" is displayed.
When there are no more waypoints to visit, the agent reaches the aircraft carrier (the agent's altitude is 0 meters) and the mission ends.
